title: Ransomware-like behavior on file server
report_text: At 02:13 UTC the file server FS-12 showed rapid file modifications and extension changes. A ransom note appeared in multiple folders. The service account 'backup_svc' had an interactive login at 01:58 from an admin workstation. Users report they cannot open shared files.

title: Phishing leading to abnormal sign-in
report_text: Several employees received an email that looked like our SSO login. One user entered credentials. We then saw repeated MFA prompts and a successful login from a new location. No ticket approved this access.

title: Possible DNS tunneling / rare domains
report_text: DNS logs show multiple hosts querying rare domains with random-looking subdomains every few minutes. Network team suspects C2 over DNS or DNS tunneling. No malware sample yet.

title: Possible DDoS on public API
report_text: Our public API latency spiked. WAF shows a traffic surge from many IPs hitting /login and /search. Error rate increased. No code deploys in the last 24h.
